data.title: Laurent Ferrier Watches at European Watch Co.
data.meta_description: Browse our latest collection of Laurent Ferrier watches, available at European Watch Company. Buy or trade-in your pre-owned timepiece today.
data.text:
Laurent Ferrier Galet Classic Dual Tourbillon Enamel Dial Limited

(54411) Laurent Ferrier LCF020.AC Galet Classic Dual Tourbillion, limited edition of 5 pieces, stainless steel case on a strap with a matching stainless steel tang buckle, manually wound double spiral tourbillon LF619.03 movement with innovative double hairspring tourbillon that allows the balance to stay centered on its axis while compensating for the effects of gravity, white "Grand Feu" enamel dial with painted Arabic numeral ho...

$139,900

View Watch

Laurent Ferrier Classic Origin Opaline Titanium

(52845) Laurent Ferrier LCF036.TIG1G Galet, Grade 5 titanium case on a calf-skin strap with a titanium tang buckle, LF116.01 manual wind caliber with 80-hour power reserve, small seconds at 6 o'clock, silvered opaline dial with applied white gold hour markers, white gold hands, display back, sapphire crystal, water resistant, size: 40mm, thickness: 10.3mm, like new, with Laurent Ferrier box and papers dated July 2022.

$24,900

View Watch

Laurent Ferrier Galet Annual Calendar Montre Ecole SS Grey Dial

(52207) Laurent Ferrier Galet Montre Ecole Annual Calendar, LF126.01, LF126 01, LF12601, stainless steel case on a strap with a stainless steel tang buckle, manual wound caliber LF126.01 annual calendar movement, small seconds at 6 o'clock, date represented around the dial with a white indicator hand, day and month of the year displayed at 12 o'clock in two windows, grey dial with white gold javelin-shaped hands, display back with ...

$35,100

View Watch

Laurent Ferrier Galet Micro Rotor SS / Ice Blue Dial

(54464) Laurent Ferrier FBN229.01 Galet Micro-Rotor, FBN 229 01, stainless steel on a strap with a steel tang buckle, micro-rotor automatic Caliber FBN 229.01, lubricant-free escapement, small seconds at 6 o'clock, ice blue dial with white gold dagger hour markers and white gold hands, display back, sapphire crystal, water resistant to 30 meters, size: 40mm, thickness: 11mm. Like New with Laurent Ferrier box and papers dated August...

$37,900

View Watch
